Destination: Japan. Best season: spring (March to May) for cherry blossoms. Recommended for: couples, culture lovers. Budget: high. Attractions: Tokyo, Kyoto, Mount Fuji.
Destination: Morocco. Best season: April to June or September to November. Recommended for: families, history enthusiasts. Budget: medium. Attractions: Marrakech, Sahara Desert, Fes.
